Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.solace

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISolaceErrorTopicResolver
    Dynamic topic resolver for error messages.
    ISolaceMessageIdResolver
    Classes implementing this interface are used to populate Solace Message with ApplicationMessageID
    ISolaceMessageTransformer
    Transforms Solace messages from/to IFIXMessages.
    ISolaceTopicResolver
    Classes implementing this interface are used to dynamically resolve topic names for a given IFIXMessage.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SolaceEndpoint
    Message processor that allows Solace messages to be routed to/from other sessions.
    SolaceMessageListener
    A message processor that transforms IFIXMessages into Solace messages and publishes them to a Solace destination.
    SolaceMessageSource
    Message processor that consumes messages from a Solace queue or topic, converts them to IFIXMessages and sends them via FIX.
    SolaceRawFIXSendingTransformer
    IMessageTransformer implementation for transforming messages between Catalys and Solace where each Solace message is a BytesMessage whose payload is a byte[].
    SolaceRawTransformer
    IMessageTransformer implementation for transforming messages between Catalys and Solace where each Solace message is a BytesMessage whose payload is a byte[].
    SolaceStringFIXSendingTransformer
    IMessageTransformer implementation for transforming messages between Catalys and Solace where each Solace message is a TextMessage whose payload is a String.
    SolaceStringTransformer
    IMessageTransformer implementation for transforming messages between Catalys and Solace where each Solace message is a TextMessage whose payload is a String.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SolacePublishException
    Exception thrown when a failure occurs while publishing a Solace message.
